name: Stone Brick Fireplace Extension
description: A Stone Brick Fireplace Extension is a hollow rectangular tower of Stone Brick masonry that forms a chimney to place on a Stone Brick Fireplace or another existing Stone Brick Fireplace Extension to extend the chimney vertically. It is usually capped with a Stone Brick Fireplace Cap .
crafted_at: Advanced Masonry Bench Electric Masonry Bench
